about_the_game:
Deepy is an underwater complex built to host a maximum-security prison, where the most dangerous inmates on earth are forced to work extracting gold from the seabed.

No one cares about their condition, or what else is done inside the prison, as they are all sentenced to life imprisonment without appeal.

The shock will come in the second room, straight after opening the door, when you face the first corpse and a messy room. You' ll also have your first confrontation with the prisoners, and from them you will be aware an uprising occurred: the prison has been taken down. They are taking over many rooms looking for a way to escape and rise to the surface.

Your task? Fight, help survivors, search for objects and solve puzzles all in order to survive, escape and reach the surface.
